info.description: B2B Supplier Security Portal API - Companies manage supplier security requirements through questionnaires and CheckFix reports
info.title: NisFix Backend API

post.description: Invalidates the user's session (client should discard tokens)
Sends a magic link to the provided email for passwordless authentication

get.description: Returns the current authenticated user and their organization

post.description: Uses refresh token to generate new access/refresh token pair
Validates the magic link token and returns access/refresh tokens

get.description: Returns basic health status
Returns detailed health information including system stats
Indicates the service is running (for Kubernetes liveness probe)
Simple ping endpoint for basic availability check
Checks if the service is ready to receive traffic (dependencies are healthy)
Gets the current user's organization details
Gets the current organization's settings
Lists all questionnaires for the company

post.description: Creates a new questionnaire, optionally from a template

get.description: Gets questionnaire statistics for the company
Gets a questionnaire with its questions

post.description: Archives a published questionnaire
Publishes a draft questionnaire
Adds a question to a draft questionnaire
Reorders questions in a draft questionnaire

delete.description: Deletes a question from a draft questionnaire

patch.description: Updates a question in a draft questionnaire

get.description: Lists all requirements for the company

post.description: Creates a new requirement for a supplier

get.description: Gets requirement statistics for the company
Gets details of a specific requirement

post.description: Approves a submitted requirement

get.description: Gets the CheckFix verification details for a requirement (company view)
get.summary: Get CheckFix verification for a requirement

post.description: Rejects a submitted requirement
Requests revision for a submitted requirement

get.description: Gets the submission details for reviewing

post.description: Links the supplier's CheckFix account

get.description: Gets the current CheckFix integration status for the supplier

post.description: Verifies a CheckFix report and stores the verification

get.description: Lists all companies that have relationships with this supplier
Gets the supplier dashboard with overview statistics
Lists all pending invitations for this supplier

post.description: Accepts a company invitation
Declines a company invitation

get.description: Lists all requirements assigned to this supplier
Gets details of a specific requirement

post.description: Submits a CheckFix report verification as a response to a requirement
post.summary: Submit CheckFix verification for a requirement

post.description: Starts a response for a requirement

get.description: Gets details of a response

post.description: Saves draft answers for a response
Submits a questionnaire response

get.description: Lists all suppliers for the company

post.description: Sends an invitation to a supplier by email

get.description: Gets supplier statistics for the company
Gets details of a specific supplier relationship

patch.description: Updates details of a supplier relationship
Updates the classification of a supplier

post.description: Reactivates a suspended supplier relationship
Suspends an active supplier relationship
Terminates a supplier relationship

get.description: Lists all available system questionnaire templates
Lists custom templates created by the company
Searches templates by name or description
Gets details of a specific template

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
